amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following new section: Sec. ___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to operate an unmanned aircraft system except in accordance with the Fourth Amendment of the Constitution.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to operate an unmanned aircraft system except in accordance with the Fourth Amendment of the Constitution.
